address: Isaac Peral, 17, Pol. Ind. Camí Ral, 08850 Gavà, Barcelona, Spain
notes: Global leader in cosmetic peptides, part of Lubrizol (Berkshire Hathaway). Key products include DMAE Bitartrate (synthetic firming agent), Thermostressine™ (firming peptide), Trylagen® (collagen-elastin stimulation complex), and Syn®-Tacks (firming and lifting peptide). Extensive clinical validation with over 40 years of peptide innovation. Strong technical support and regulatory expertise.
